::KitKat::

She snapped into Commander mode right away.  She could no longer 
think like a female in love.  She had to command. "Drillbit! YOu will 
stand down..NOW! I have made a command decision, for your own good 
and that of my team. You will follow my orders. If not, then you will 
stay here and not go into battle. I am putting my feelings aside and 
doing what I think is best. I will ask you to do the same."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He looked at her.
> "What?! You put me under HIS command! This is stupid! and pretty 
low for
> my own fiance!(Did I spell that right?)
